spherical coordinates



SphericalCoordf

typedef struct {
  float r; // radial distance
  float polar; // polar angle(period PI)
  float azimuth; // azimuthal angle (period 2 PI)
} SphericalCoordf;
type: C struct

SphericalCoordd

typedef struct {
  double r; // radial distance
  double polar; // polar angle(period PI)
  double azimuth; // azimuthal angle (period 2 PI)
} SphericalCoordd;
type: C struct

m_spherical_to_cartesiand

void m_spherical_to_cartesiand(double *spherical, double *res);
type: C function
description: transform spherical coordinates to cartesian (vec3)

m_cartesian_to_sphericald

void m_cartesian_to_sphericald(double *vec, double *res);
type: C function
description: transform cartesian coordinates (vec3) to spherical

m_spherical_to_cartesianf

void m_spherical_to_cartesianf(float *spherical, float *res);
type: C function
description: transform spherical coordinates to cartesian (vec3)

m_cartesian_to_sphericalf

void m_cartesian_to_sphericalf(float *vec, float *res);
type: C function
description: transform cartesian coordinates (vec3) to spherical
